Sujong Jeong is a professor of climate science at the Seoul National University. His research focuses on global carbon cycle by utilizing various measurements, process-based models, and AI. 

## Education
- [PhD in Atmospheric Science]{.fw-bold} | Seoul National University | 2010

## Professional Experience
- [2018 – present]{.fw-bold} Professor, Seoul National University
- [2023 – present]{.fw-bold} Principal Investigator, Korea Carbon Project (https://www.korea-carbon-project.org), South Korea
- [2023 – present]{.fw-bold} Director, Climate Tech Center, Seoul National University

- [2018 – present:]{.fw-bold} 	Professor, Seoul National University
- [2023 – present:]{.fw-bold} 	Principal Investigator, [Korea Carbon Project](https://www.korea-carbon-project.org), South Korea
- [2023 – present:]{.fw-bold} 	Director, Climate Tech Center, Seoul National University
